messages.missing_permissions: ❌ You don't have enough permissions to execute this command.
messages.invalid_command: ❌ Unknown command. Use **!mk help** to see the available commands.
messages.cooldown_error: ❌ You type very fast. Please retry in **{}** seconds.
messages.languages_description: **LangID** column contains the way each language package must be called by in commands.
messages.status_description: Check the status of various services of the bot.
messages.modules_description: **ModuleID** column contains the way each module must be called by in commands.
messages.embed_description: All commands must be preceded by the prefix **!mk**. Example: **!mk start**
embed_field1_value:
⠀
**help** - Shows all available commands.
**status** - Shows the status of the loaded modules.
⠀
embed_field2_value:
⠀
**start** - Starts the main process in the channel where the command is executed.
**stop** - Stops the main process.
**reload** - Reloads configuration, modules and language packages.

**enable (ModuleID)** - Command to enable AutomatiK modules.
**disable (ModuleID)** - Command to disable AutomatiK modules.
**modules** - Shows information about loaded modules and their **ModuleID**

**mention (@MyRole)** - Select which role will be mentioned in Automatik's messages.
**notify (name) (link)** - Notify games manually through the bot.

**language (LangID)** - Change the language of the messages.
**languages** - Shows information about language packages and their **LangID**
⠀
generic_messages: {} can be found for free on {}
